page.title: 15EVENTS AND CUSTOMS
page.content: { ST.JAMES'DAY St.James' day is the nearest Saturday to July 25th.To elect the St.James' day queen,the village has a concert in The Grenville Rooms.Two attendants to the queen are chosen from children aged 5_8 years.On the concert evening,the audience is entertained by singers, acts and sometimes a fashion show.On St. James' day,most of the villagers attend and have an enjoyable time.The crowning is followed by amusements like The Holsworthy Band,sports for children and Cornish cream teas.In the evening,a disco is held in The Grenville Rooms or at the football club from 8pm till 12 midnight.
